items.sentence: There's no reason why you shouldn't stay a while longer.
I couldn't stay in the water very long. It was too cold.
Tom was late to work because he forgot to set his alarm.
You're fired! You have an hour to clean out your office.
If you can't socially distance, you have to wear a mask.
Tom said his parents let him do anything he wants to do.

Tom told Mary that she should quit pretending to be mad.
Tom said doing that was more difficult than he expected.
I've never had this much trouble buying a ticket before.
I was surprised to find out that Tom could speak French.
If you don't bring a gift, you'll make a bad impression.
There was a murder in my apartment building last summer.
